Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:brief to dueling mask else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:metal) dueling mask"

"set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:examine to A dueling mask else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\) dueling mask"

"if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine). Narrow eyeholes allow a view of one's opponent. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design. Narrow eyeholes allow a view of one's opponent."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The brow is engraved with \$sam(\)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) = none then set this.trait:look:brow to \$prop(this.trait:look:brow). else set this.trait:look:brow to \$prop(this.trait:look:brow), engraved with \$sam(\)."

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "react:descsub"
"run"
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:brief to dueling mask else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:metal) dueling mask"

"set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:metal) = none then set this.trait:examine to A dueling mask else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\) dueling mask"

"if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine). Narrow eyeholes allow a view of one's opponent. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design. Narrow eyeholes allow a view of one's opponent."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The brow is engraved with \$sam(\)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.trait:look:brow to The brow of \$sam(\)"
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) = none then set this.trait:look:brow to \$prop(this.trait:look:brow). else set this.trait:look:brow to \$prop(this.trait:look:brow), engraved with \$sam(\)."
"return"
"set this.xdesc to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:brief:blade to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) blade :: set this.trait:look:blade to A ten-inch blade on \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:look:blade) :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) It is engraved with \$sam(\) near the guard."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine:blade to \$prop(this.trait:examine:blade) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"set this.trait:brief:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) pommel :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:look:pommel to A else set this.trait:look:pommel to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:look:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:stone) = none then set this.trait:examine:pommel to \$prop(this.trait:look:pommel) else set this.trait:examine:pommel to A pommel on \$prop(this.xdesc), set with \$prop(this.xstone)."
"set this.trait:brief:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) hilt :: set this.trait:look:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc)."
"set this.trait:examine:hilt to A hilt on \$prop(this.xdesc), consisting of \$prop(this.ztemp) leather-wrapped grip, a short guard and a pommel."
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine:hilt to \$prop(this.trait:examine:hilt) The pommel is set with \$prop(this.xstone)."

"set this.trait:brief:guard to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) guard :: set this.trait:look:guard to A guard on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: set this.trait:examine:guard to A short metal bar, mounted between the grip and blade of \$prop(this.xdesc)."

"set this.trait:brief:grip to \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) grip :: set this.trait:look:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc). :: if \$prop(this.trait:color) = none then set this.trait:examine:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with leather. else set this.trait:examine:grip to A grip on \$prop(this.xdesc), wrapped with \$prop(this.trait:color) leather."
"rem"
"set this.ztemp to nil :: set this.xstone to nil :: set this.xdesc to nil :: return"
